comments.comment: This episode has 2 sides.First, throughout Sri Lankans History, Muslims had married into All Ethnic Groups.Ask the Armed Forces,Police,The Mercantile Sector,Banks, you'll find the Truth in what I say.In my family,we have Buddhists,Tamils,and Christians.Our parents nor the Mosques kept a knife at our throats.Theres no COMPULSION IN ISLAM to change ones Religion by Force.As in All Religions,there are I'll informed Fanatics,like Rathne and Gnanasara Himi,and Muslims are no exceptions.This is a stray incident.The second part is that Gnanasara is trying to make this an Religious/Ethnic issue.PLEASE,THE GENERAL PUBLIC, DON'T FALL INTO THIS TRAP.OUR MULTICULTURAL,MULTIRELIGIOUS MARRIAGES,MAKES THIS COUNTRY BEAUTIFUL.
